chapter.title: Spring Data
chapter.para: Spring Data is a SpringSource project that aims to provide Spring's convenient programming model and well known conventions for NOSQL databases. Currently there is support for Graph (e.g. Neo4j), Key-Value (e.g. Redis), Document (e.g. MongoDB) and Relational (e.g. Oracle) databases. Mark Pollack, the author of Spring.NET is the project lead for the Spring Data project.
